PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05672020-08-23ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Ozone-depleting Substances and Halocarbon Alternatives Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OZONE-DEPLETING SUBSTANCES AND HALOCARBON ALTERNATIVES REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the consumption baseline value that is used to determine the Hydrofluorocarbon (HFC) quantities that can enter Canada under the HFC phase-down process, which started on January 1, 2019, to reflect corrected consumption data reported by companies importing HFCs in bulk; and (2) ensure adequate supply of 2,2 dichloro-1,1,1-trifluoroethane (HCFC-123) for use as a fire-extinguishing agent in situations where an alternative may not be available for certain critical aircraft rescue and fire-fighting applications.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0177 Publication Date: 2020-09-02
AttachmentsAttachment
